name: Wight Baking
text: This card's name becomes "Skull Servant" while in the GY. If a Level 3 or lower Zombie monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can discard this card instead. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 2 monsters with different names from your Deck to your hand, that are "Skull Servant" and/or specifically list the card "Skull Servant" in their text, except "Wight Baking", then discard 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Wight Baking" once per turn.
